price: 149. Nabiyow keenik ixxic: isin abtaanamih sumaq Aalle wayteenik, toysa sin akkal yargiqe Sumaaqay duddale Yalli Ie, tokkel usuk faxinnay inkih tirri sin haak yen massale gital.
arabic: قُلۡ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحُجَّةُ ٱلۡبَٰلِغَةُۖ فَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul falillahi al-ḥujatu al-bālighatu falaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
